description: A very large Eldraine-inspired package featuring Adventure, Food, Adamant, Knights/Faeries tribal, monocolor bonuses, and fairytale motifs. No card text is copied; all rules are fresh templates.

Creature: {TRIGGER_INTRO} creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
{SELF_WORDS} has protection from red as long as you control a Food.
When you cast an Aura spell that targets {SELF}, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
Whenever a Knight you control attacks, {SELF_WORDS} gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Instant: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's a Knight, it gains first strike until end of turn.
Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
Sorcery: Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
Tap up to two target creatures. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Enchantment: Creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control a Food.
Equipment: Whenever equipped creature attacks, create a 1/1 white Human creature token. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each Equipment you control. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Land: {T}: Add {W}. {W},{T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{T}: Add {W}. {2}{W},{T}: Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

Creature: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, {SELF_WORDS} gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{SELF_WORDS} can't be blocked as long as you control a Food.
Instant: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
Tap up to two target creatures. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Draw two cards. Adamant — {ADAMANT_COND} scry 2 first.
Sorcery: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. {FOOD_CREATION}.
Enchantment: Whenever you sacrifice a Food, draw a card, then discard a card.
Spells your opponents cast that target your creatures cost {1} more to cast.
Equipment: Equipped creature has flying and +1/+1. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
AuraCreature: {AURA_BONUS}. When {SELF} enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{AURA_BONUS}. As long as you control a Food, enchanted creature has hexproof.
Land: {T}: Add {U}. {2}{U},{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

Creature: {TRIGGER_INTRO} each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever you sacrifice a Food, put a +1/+1 counter on {SELF}.
Rats you control get +1/+0 and have menace.
Instant: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
Destroy target tapped creature. You create a Food token.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Adamant — {ADAMANT_COND} return two instead.
Sorcery: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. {FOOD_CREATION}.
Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Enchantment: Whenever a creature you control dies, create a Food token.
At the beginning of your end step, if you sacrificed a Food this turn, each opponent loses 2 life.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has menace. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and "Whenever this creature dies, create a Food token."
Land: {T}: Add {B}. {2}{B},{T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Creature: Dwarves and Knights you control have haste.
Whenever you sacrifice a Food, {SELF_WORDS} gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Instant: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Create two 1/1 red Dwarf creature tokens.
Sorcery: Create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
Enchantment: Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, {SELF_WORDS} deals 1 damage to any target.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each Equipment you control. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has menace.
Enchanted creature has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
Land: {T}: Add {R}. {1}{R},{T}: Create a 1/1 red Dwarf creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.

Creature: Wolves you control get +1/+1 and have trample.
Whenever you sacrifice a Food, untap {SELF_WORDS}.
Instant: Target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don't control.
Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn.
Sorcery: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Enchantment: Creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you create a Food, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Foods you control.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and trample. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, create a Food token. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Food you control.

Enchantment: Whenever you cast a creature spell, {FOOD_CREATION}.
Land: {T}: Add {C}. {2},{T}, Sacrifice a Food: Draw a card.

Enchantment: Whenever you cast a creature spell, {FOOD_CREATION}.
Land: {T}: Add {C}. {2},{T}, Sacrifice a Food: Draw a card.

TRIGGER_INTRO: At the beginning of your upkeep,
At the beginning of combat on your turn,
ADAMANT_COND: if at least three {COLOR_WORD} mana was spent to cast this spell,
if {ADAMANT_COLOR} was the majority of mana spent to cast this,
if {ADAMANT_COLOR} mana fueled this spell in abundance,
ADAMANT_EFFECT_W: put a +1/+1 counter on up to two target creatures you control
create a 1/1 white Human creature token
ADAMANT_EFFECT_U: tap up to two target creatures an opponent controls. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step
return up to one target nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand
ADAMANT_EFFECT_B: each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life
return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield
put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control and it gains menace until end of turn
ADAMANT_EFFECT_R: this spell deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets
create a 1/1 red Dwarf creature token with "This creature can't block"
discard a card, then draw two cards
ADAMANT_EFFECT_G: search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle
put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures
ADVENTURE_EFFECTS_W: Exile target tapped creature until {SELF} leaves the battlefield
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn
Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens
ADVENTURE_EFFECTS_U: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand
ADVENTURE_EFFECTS_B: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn
Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life
Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less
ADVENTURE_EFFECTS_R: Create two 1/1 red Dwarf creature tokens
Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn
ADVENTURE_EFFECTS_G: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle
Target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don't control
Create a Food token and draw a card
FOOD_CREATION: Create a Food token. You gain 3 life
FOOD_SAC_PAYOFF: Whenever a Food enters the battlefield under your control, {EFFECT_SMALL}.
EFFECT_SMALL: put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control
KNIGHT_PAYOFF: Whenever a Knight you control attacks, it gains first strike until end of turn
Whenever a Knight enters the battlefield under your control, {EFFECT_SMALL}
FAERIE_PAYOFF: Whenever a Faerie you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery, create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying
HUMAN_PAYOFF: Whenever a Human enters the battlefield under your control, {EFFECT_SMALL}
DWARF_PAYOFF: Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 red Dwarf creature token
AURA_BONUS: enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance
enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike
enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and has hexproof
EQUIP_BONUS: equipped creature has first strike and trample
equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has vigilance
TARGET_C: up to one target creature you control
